issue.title: [Java] Apache Arrow Java Cookbook v2
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16558](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16558). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Extends Apache Arrow Java Cookbook with more advanced examples
